metadata.summary: Network traffic analysis extension that generates Zeek logs from PCAP files for intrusion detection
metadata.primary_use_case: Analyze network traffic from PCAP captures to detect intrusions and generate network telemetry

extracted_apis.description: Process PCAP file and generate JSON logs
Upload PCAP file as artifact for Zeek processing
Preview conversion of legacy Zeek service rules
Execute conversion of legacy Zeek service rules

cross_refs.description: Requires PCAP artifacts to be collected before Zeek can process them
Zeek extracts files from PCAPs that can be analyzed by Strelka
